boardgame.name: Ta Yü
Tayü
Tayu
boardgame.description: In Ta Y_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_amp;uuml;, a game of connections, one side tries to extend from the starting tile in the center to reach the western and eastern edges of the board while the opposing side tries to reach the northern and southern edges. On your turn you simply draw a tile and decide where to place it, extending the network of tiles already on the board._T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;Several refinements make this simple proposition into an engrossing game. First, each tile is 3x1 (to be played on a 19x19 board) and has exactly three outlets (potential connection points). Second, your score is not simply the number of spots you've reached on one edge added to the number of spots you've reached on the other, but is the product of those two numbers. So you can't just concentrate on one side and ignore the other, because zero times anything is still zero. Third, on each side of the board there are three special points which score double if reached, adding a dab of focus to the choices._T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;Interestingly, you need to play both offense and defense and will often have to decide to which use to put a particular tile._T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;

One copy of the original Ta Yü, Kosmos edition in German with an English language rules printout. Includes box, insert, a drawstring bag or two (in case you want to separate the circle-back tiles from the non-circle-back tiles), gameboard, and all tiles. Played about 5 times. Slight wear on all components, except the tiles, which you could run over with a truck and they would still be fine. Heavy sucker. Domestic insured shipping $15.00. International insured shipping at least $30.00 and probably more depending on your location. Buyer must be a BGG member for at least 3 months please, preferably with some trade or marketplace feedback already.

Goliath B.V. (GTH 70418) In Ta Yü, a sumptuously produced game of connections, one side tries to extend from the starting tile in the center to reach the western and eastern edges of the board while the opposing side tries to reach the northern and southern edges. On your turn you simply draw a tile and decide where to place it, extending the network of tiles already on the board. Several refinements make this simple proposition into an engrossing game. First, each tile is 3x1 (to be played on a 19x19 board) and has exactly three outlets (potential connection points). Second, your score is not simply the number of spots you_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_#039;ve reached on one edge added to the number of spots you_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_#039;ve reached on the other, but is the product of those two numbers. So you can_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_#039;t just concentrate on one side and ignore the other, because zero times anything is still zero. Third, on each side of the board there are three special points which score double if reached, adding a dab of focus to the choices. Interestingly, you need to play both offense and defense and will often have to decide to which use to put a particular tile.
German KOSMOS version. Has english instructions print out. played 1x

On your turn you simply draw a tile and decide where to place it, extending the network of tiles already on the board. Several refinements make this simple proposition into an engrossing game. First, each tile is 3x1 (to be played on a 19x19 board) and has exactly three outlets (potential connection points). Second, your score is not simply the number of spots you_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_#039;ve reached on one edge added to the number of spots you_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_#039;ve reached on the other, but is the product of those two numbers. I can not give any guarantees or refunds. Nevertheless as a board game collector I describe the item as accurate as possible. In case of missing tiles or damages I mention this in the item description. Diesen Artikel verkaufe ich als Privatperson. Eine Garantie oder eine Ruecknahme biete ich nicht an. Als Sammler von Brettspielen achte ich jedoch sehr genau auf den Zustand und auf die Vollzaehligkeit. Die Spiele sind daher meistens tadellos erhalten. The game is new and still in shrink wrap! I will ship from Germany and I am willing to ship anywhere. Please ask me, for the shipping costs for your land. I will charge shipping at cost. Everything will be well packed. You can pay me through Paypal or bank transfer to my German bank account but any fees charged must be covered by you. If you buy more games, then I make all in one package! We have a large private collection of games. Due to space and time constraints we must rid ourselves of some of the games. Therefore, these are private sales.
